introduction.section1: Taiwan is a modern island and is mainly known for its capital Taipei, but you will discover exceptional panoramas. Go on treks in Taroko National Park, discover the mountainous city of Jiufen and its extraordinary peak view, or walk near the beaches to discover atypical rock formations.
introduction.section2: Discover through our articles and our photos our trip to Taiwan.

google-description: Discover the island of Taiwan beyond its modern capital. Go on treks in Taroko National Park, discover the mountainous city of Jiufen and its extraordinary peak view, or walk near the beaches to discover atypical rock formations. Follow our guide to discover our selection of must-see places. Our travelogue with photos, tips, and advice.
social-network-description: Discover the island of Taiwan beyond its modern capital. Go on treks in Taroko National Park, discover the mountainous city of Jiufen and its extraordinary peak view, or walk near the beaches to discover atypical rock formations.
